actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: the Secretary of Agriculture to cease the withholding of funds for rural housing programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to terminate the suspension of housing assistance programs under his jurisdiction and to cease the withholding of funds for such programs. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to cease the withholding of funds for rural housing programs.

titles.title: the Secretary of Agriculture to cease the withholding of funds for rural housing programs, and for other purposes.
